adDetails: Experienced movers contracted by local stores and stagers in Santa Rosa ready to meet your delivery and set up needs of Furniture including bunk, loft, wall and, sleigh beds, as well as Tempur-Pedic and Adjustables . Our flexible plans are listed below: Plan 1-- $65.00 Hr for two movers, 3 hr min includes 24 foot long box van with lift-gate, ramp, tie-downs, hand-trucks, blankets, and dollies. Cost for 8hrs including diesel is $520.00. -- Plan 2--$120 per day Truck Rental plus cost to refuel truck with diesel. Box Van as described and equipped in Plan1-- plus one man for $25 an hr. 3hr min. Cost for 8hrs $320.00 plus diesel ( Plan 3--$120 per day Truck Rental plus cost to refuel truck with diesel is for 24 foot box van equipped as above. Truck will be dropped off for loading and then moved to it's destination for unloading--no additional charge for this service. We are located in beautiful Santa Rosa. For more info contact Lou show contact info.
